description:
If you are new to Meteor or looking to expand your knowledge, this course comes in a full package. You learn and master Meteor by building a complete eCommerce application.

You don't have to worry if you are new in we development because this course will take you to the advance level in step by step and pragmatic way.

This course not only aims to make you master Meteor BUT also to teach how to build an application that exhibit most features you see in the real world applications.

By the end of this course, storing your files in the cloud and integrating Paypal payment into your applications will be a piece of cake!!

Let's take off and GET STARTED!
title: Meteor js - Marketplace Site + Amazon S3 +Paypal Integration
